mapper.select: SELECT t.TRADE_ID, t.USER_ID, t.ITEM_ID, t.PRICE, t.TRADE_TYPE, TO_CHAR(t.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATE_DATE, t.CONFIRM_DATE, t.IS_RECOMMEND, t.STAGE, i.IMAGE1, i.ITEM_NAME FROM TRADES t INNER JOIN ITEMS i ON t.ITEM_ID = i.ITEM_ID WHERE t.TRADE_ID = #{tradeId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAYMENTS ( IMP_UID, TRADE_ID, APPLY_NUM, BANK_NAME, CARD_NAME, CARD_NUMBER, PAID_AMOUNT, PAID_AT, PAY_METHOD, PG_PROVIDER, PG_TID, PG_TYPE, RECEIPT_URL, STATUS, ) VALUES ( #{imp_uid}, #{trade_id}, #{apply_num}, #{bank_name}, #{card_name}, #{paid_amount}, TO_DATE('1970-01-01 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') + NUMTODSINTERVAL(#{paid_at}, 'SECOND'), #{pay_method}, #{pg_provider}, #{pg_tid}, #{pg_type}, #{receipt_url}, #{status} )
INSERT INTO POINTS ( POINT_ID, AMOUNT, CREATE_DATE, CMT, USER_ID, IS_ADD, CAT) VALUES ( POINT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{amount}, SYSDATE, #{cmt}, #{userid}, -1, 5 )
mapper.update: UPDATE TRADES SET IS_SUCCESS = 1 WHERE TRADE_ID = #{tradeId}
